name: Baldi jinks
description:
Welcome To Baldi jinks, That's Me.a Joke game that never meant to be seen before.I have changed all the characters with sounds (except arts and crafts but still has a voice changed)if you want me to make more games then follow me.

arrow keys to move. E to use BSoda. Space to jump with playtime. Use the numbers to answer Baldi's questions.

Warning: Do Not Use Arrow Keys While Answering Questions, You Could Get Stuck In The Walls!!!
